text:
Nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three,
two, one, coming! Ready or not!

Oh, hey, hello boys and girls. I am playing
hide and seek with Maggie. Can you see her?

Oh hey, I think she is under the slide. Hey,
let´s go and surprise her. Come on.

Shhh, we have to be quiet because Maggie is
hiding under the slide. Hey, you know what

a slide is, don´t you? No? Oh look, this
is a slide. Yeah! Hey, say it with me. It´s

a slide. Come on. It´s a slide. Let me hear
you. It´s a slide. Yeah! And Maggie is hiding

under the slide. Here we go. Watch this. Are
you ready? Maggie, I…

Abracadabra!
…see you! Oh, hey, she is not under the

slide. What´s going on? I guess I was wrong.
Maggie isn´t under the slide. So where is

she? I need your help. Can you see her?
I think I can see her over there in the sandpit.

Shhh! Oh, that must be Maggie over there in
the sandpit. Oh what? You don´t know what

a sandpit is? This is a sandpit. Hey, say
it with me. What is it? It´s a sandpit. Come

on. It´s a sandpit. What is it? It´s a sandpit.
That´s right. Ok, time to surprise Maggie.

Ok. Maggie, I…
Abracadabra!

…see you! Oh, hey! I was wrong again. I
was sure Maggie was in the sandpit. Oh well,

where is she? Can you see Maggie anywhere?
Hey, is that her? Over there on the climbing

frame? Let´s go and see. Yeah, yeah, yeah,
yeah. That´s definitely Maggie up there on

the climbing frame. What´s a climbing frame?
This is a climbing frame. Hey, say it with

me. What is it? It´s a climbing frame. Come
on. It´s a climbing frame. And again. It´s

a climbing frame. That´s right. Ok, time
to catch Maggie.

Abracadabra!
Here we go! Haha, got you! Hey, that´s not

Maggie. It´s a cap. Oh, I guess I was wrong
again. Maggie isn´t on the climbing frame.

Oh, hey, that´s not mine. I don´t know.
So Maggie wasn´t under the slide. She wasn´t

in the sand pit or on the climbing frame.
Oh I give up and sit down here on this roundabout.

Oh what? You don´t know what a roundabout
is? This is a roundabout. Say it with me.

It´s a roundabout. It´s a roundabout. Come
on. It´s a roundabout. That´s right. Oh,

but where is Maggie? I think she must be using
her magic and that´s naughty. Hey, can you

see Maggie anywhere? What? She is under the
roundabout?

Oh no!
Really?

Abracadabra!
Maggie! Stop using Maggie magic now! Hey!

Abracadabra!
Hey, oh no! Where am I? Oh, I am on a swing.

You know what a swing is, don´t you? Well,
this is a swing. Hey, say it with me. What

is it? It´s a swing. And again. What is it?
It´s a swing. One more time. What is it?

It´s a swing. That´s right but how do I
get down? Oh, Maggie! Maggie! Oh, what a naughty

naughty bird! See you next time. Bye-bye!
Maggie!
